title: Support binpack + non-binpack parameters.

comments.body:
## [Current coverage][1] is `92.60%`
> Merging **#85** into **master** will decrease coverage by **-2.61%** as of [`390e2e9`][3]


```diff
@@            master    #85   diff @@
=====================================
  Files           14     14       
  Stmts          877    919    +42
  Branches       104    114    +10
  Methods                         
=====================================
+ Hit            835    851    +16
  Partial          0      0       
- Missed          42     68    +26
```

> Review entire [Coverage Diff][4] as of [`390e2e9`][3]


-----

1. `+1.41%` via [...estFirstSearch.scala#269...281](https://codecov.io/github/olafurpg/scalafmt/core/src/main/scala/org/scalafmt/internal/BestFirstSearch.scala?ref=390e2e90e3079c46e6efa9bf2a4cc2ea885f118f#269)

> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io). Updated on successful CI builds.

body:
* Scala.js has binpacked arguments, I prefer non-binpack.
* Setup test suite for scalajs
* Fix bug in best optimization + EOF single line policies.

```
[info] Benchmark                        Mode  Cnt     Score     Error  Units
[info] GenJsCode.scalafmt               avgt   10  2104.339 ± 363.524  ms/op
[info] GenJsCode.scalariform            avgt   10   259.584 ±  44.253  ms/op
[info] JavaLangString.scalafmt          avgt   10   196.015 ±  11.650  ms/op
[info] JavaLangString.scalariform       avgt   10     9.484 ±   3.620  ms/op
[info] OptimizerCore.scalafmt           avgt   10  1364.811 ± 100.927  ms/op
[info] OptimizerCore.scalariform        avgt   10   239.519 ±  11.399  ms/op
[info] ScalaJSClassEmitter.scalafmt     avgt   10   297.809 ±  31.952  ms/op
[info] ScalaJSClassEmitter.scalariform  avgt   10    38.075 ±   2.490  ms/op

Observe the slowdown for GenJsCode, I guess this comes from the
increased complexity of non-binpacked.
```
